name: Maze (itch) (Stu Bean)
description:
Howdy everyone, this is MAZE, a game I made in high school and part of college. It is by far not a very polished title, but yet I am still proud of it! It's my 2nd "official" game I made awhile ago. Oh the nostalgia!

**DISCLAIMER** The audio got a little bit messed up when I retrieved these old files and it is all scratchy. Unfortunately I can't find a way to fix it. But there are some comedic dialogue if you'd like to hear :)
